name: Sean Butler
description: An SEO Agency based out of London UK with clients on 3 continents. The Founder Sean Butler stated SearchButlers having spent 7 years as Head of Global SEO for ReachLocal and Gannett; the USA Network. During that time his strategies helped over 6000 local businesses with customised SEO campaigns generating over 3 million leads. SearchButlers campaigns benefit from the aggreagte experience of each of those successful strategies. We work with local businesses in USA, UK and Australia.
